Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Came back to the forums roughly 2 weeks ago.  Tried to ask something of Galileo by doing the @Galileo think, and that didn't get his attention.
After 3 failed tries sending him a PM (mail would say: "cannot send that user a message"), I managed to do it a few days ago.   Still nothing.
Now I was out of the loop a looooong time (nearly 2 years), but I've seen him post in early September.  For all I know He might be busy with RL or himself on a long break

If anyone know him as a friend, or outside of KSP, could anyone relay the message for him to check his KSP forum inbox?
It's definitely not urgent, but I am starting to wonder.

Thanks.

Last visited an hour ago, should be here. @Galileo, sorry to bother you, but your attention is requested!

There might be a chance he blocked you for some reason, and that's why you are getting the error, but I doubt it.

I am around, but have been working a lot lately, and any down time I get, I spend with my wife and daughter . I have seen your message and requests, but I always forget to respond at the end of my work day. When I get some time I will try to work on things.

Alright, I figured it was something like that.  Thanks for the heads-up.  When you get around to it, let me know and we can talk.
Thanks for taking the time to reply.
Thread moved to Kerbal Network since it's about a player rather than the game.
